ProductInfo.Features:
The world's most simple surveillance system: Coomatec DVRCam dome is the first camera which include all-in-one security system. It can record without for an additional DVR system
It is a real play and plug surveillance camera. Only get the right time while connecting to your computer.
It is a stand alone camera. Just plug in.
The 2-32GB TF card is available. The TF card should be in good quality, not the piracy.
14 days circular recording. The video played by PC and smart phone can help you find something abnormal.
ProductInfo.Name: (Record without for an Additional DVR System) Coomatec DVRCam dome REAL Plug and play DVR CCTV surveillance camera built in TF
